== Keywords documentation ==

Eclipse Library keywords documentation can be found under 
[http://robotframework-eclipselibrary.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/org.lcx.robotframework.eclipselibrary-testcases/documentation/EclipseLibrary.html in EclipseLibrary.html]

== Keywords completion for RIDE ==

Additional XML file is provided to use keyword completipn with Robot IDE.

This file should be added to PYTHONPATH

It can be found under [http://robotframework-eclipselibrary.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/org.lcx.robotframework.eclipselibrary-testcases/documentation/EclipseLibrary.xml in EclipseLibrary.xml]
